pkgmetadata.longdescription: This package contains the code from importlib as found in dev-lang/python 2.7. It is provided so that people who wish to use importlib.import_module() with a version of dev-lang/python prior to 2.7 or in 3.0 have the function readily available. The code in no way deviates from what can be found in the 2.7 trunk.
